entry.title: Blasphemous Rumors
entry.summary:
Author: Fluffmonster69

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,720Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 32

Summary: Inspired by the events of Batman: Gotham By Gaslight (1989) Bruce Wayne is on trial, believed to be Jack the Ripper after the serial murders follow him from London to Gotham. Clark Kent is sent to report on the trial and the week leading to Bruce's execution. He is unnerved by Bruce, who's appearance and demeanor have drastically changed, however upon arriving back in Gotham a day after the trial Clark is greeted with the city in uproar. Bruce Wayne has escaped his imprisonment and criminals start cropping up half dead covered in identical puncture wounds. Clark sets out to find Bruce as Superman, finding instead a monster lurking in the shadows of Gotham's streets.*Tags and warnings may change.Updates once a week :)

entry.title: Can't Stop the Feeling (or the Gay Panic)
entry.summary:
Author: fluffpuff

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,393Chapters: 4/9Kudos: 46

Summary: It starts with a karaoke night. Or maybe it doesn’t.Over the course of one week, a series of completely unrelated (read: wildly dramatic, suspiciously timed) events unfold across the lives of several very queer, very emotionally unstable heroes. There’s tension. There’s pining. There’s pop music. And absolutely no one is communicating.Each chapter features:✨ One ship🎶 One pop song💥 One emotional crisis💋 One bad decision (minimum!)By the time the week is over, someone’s cried to Taylor Swift, someone’s made out to Kylie Minogue, someone’s broken a window, and at least three people have had a gay awakening. Maybe the universe is trying to tell them something. Or maybe the super group chat is cursed.

entry.title: welcome-ish
entry.summary:
Author: mikaminato

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,445Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 813

Summary: "I need... I want," Bruce pants, struggling to breathe and talk at the same time, "Fuck me, Clark..."And if Clark ever had any doubt, it vanishes now. The man beneath him, moaning and twisting under his touch, is Batman.There's no room left for questions. It's the same voice he heard months ago, pleading in the dark from a faceless man. Only this time, he's the one without a face. And this time, no one is eavesdropping on those sounds, because the one who used to listen is now the one making Bruce fall apart like this. (Or, Clark thinks Batman has a very nice voice. It's been stuck in his head ever since he accidentally heard him during… sex. There's something about Bruce Wayne's voice that feels strangely familiar.)

entry.title: The Phantom Robin
entry.summary:
Author: Scarletred1990

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,324Chapters: 31/?Kudos: 599

Summary: Danny wasn't a Fenton. He wasn't their original child, in fact, he was their nephew. A nephew they lied to. They thought they were helping him, but all it did was cause him to resent them. Cause him to run away. He needed to fix this mistake he unknowingly made.Dick wasn't a Wayne, but he liked pretending to be. It felt better than remembering that he was abandoned by someone he thought he could trust. Someone he thought would never leave his side. Someone who wasn't there for their deaths.Yet, they couldn't stay away from each other for too long. After all, they were two halves of the same whole.

entry.title: World's Finest
entry.summary:
Author: Salamence_373

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,914Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 5

Summary: Clark is new to Metropolis after landing his dream job as a journalist at the Daily Planet that's in a frenzy covering the new hero Superman that's moved to town. Bruce has been fighting as Batman for three years but still has a long way to go juggling his double life. These two have been searching for meaning as they strive towards their ultimate goals on an inevitable collision course. Their rivalry sparks new passion from both of them as they find out they aren't so different after all, while finding what's been missing from their lives. They each bring out the best in each other and make them better heroes and people as they build for a better tomorrow.
